bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: kustomize.go delete doesn't check that its pointing to the correct cluster
bug.description:
kustomize.go delete will use the current kubernetes client
kubeflow/bootstrap/v2/pkg/kfapp/kustomize/kustomize.go
Line 463 in d0c11dd
if err := kustomize.initK8sClients(); err != nil {
This means that if the current context isn't pointing at the cluster corresponding to the ${KFAPP} directory they are running kfctl in they will delete the wrong cluster. kfctl should at a minimum check its k8s client is pointing at the right cluster and if not throw an error.
